title: Integrated Knowledge Construction for Vocational Education: Mobile-Based Peer-Assisted Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational workplace experience or understanding of basic language education concepts
context.additional_context: Vocational language education conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, focusing on integrating field experience and theoretical knowledge in a short-term program

learning_goals: Learners can interact with peers via a mobile platform to describe in writing situations experienced in professional settings.
Learners can provide at least three specific and practical feedbacks on peers' written work.
Learners can enhance integrated language proficiency by revising and improving their writing based on feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
